description:
SophiApp is a free, open-source app for fine-tuning Windows 10 and Windows 11.
It offers a modern UI/UX, more than 130 unique tweaks, and shows how Windows can be configured without making any harm to the OS.
summary: The most powerful open source tweaker for fine-tuning Windows 10 and Windows 11. The next chapter of the Sophia Script project.
author: Sophia Community
